channel.title: Compiling Error
channel.description:
its probably really obvious wat the problem is but i havnt got much experience in this sort of matter and was wondering if i could get some help it would be greatly appreciated [IMG]http://i12.photobucket.com/albums/a202/Kegging/compileerror.jpg[/img] im getting this error when i compile the server [IMG]http://i12.photobucket.com/albums/a202/Kegging/runservererror.jpg[/img] and get this when i try to run the server
in the original file i am also getting the exact same error so i have assumed it cant be because i have coded something wrong... it must be that i have set it up incorrectly or something :S
thanks in advance for ur help :)

item.title: Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @aviv3 aviv3
item.description:
@aviv3 wrote:

FIXED!!! ty vm xEnt!!!

to other ppl who are having this error all i did was download a java development kit which i got off searching in google. it downloaded into my java folder and produced a jdk file which had the tools.jar file in it… to fix the compiling error i right clicked on compile and clicked edit then changed the java_home path to the path which the jdk folder was in. thx again for ur help and easyrsc. this got my adventurer working w00t

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

you don’t even have jdk (java development kit) installed. If you have your paths are wrong.

Read full topic
